duties_responsibilities.duty: Strategize and create compelling social media content plans aligned with the brand and target audience.
Develop original text, graphics, and videos tailored for specific social media platforms.
Collaborate with the marketing team to ensure brand consistency across all social media channels.
Utilize metrics to continuously refine and improve content strategies.
Manage the content calendar to ensure timely and effective campaigns.
Engage with the online community through timely and authentic responses.
Stay updated on the latest social media trends and integrate them into content strategies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, or a related field
